sentences.english: Farmers didn't have to scrambled to plant common vegetables this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年农民不再一窝蜂似的种大路菜了。

sentences.english: In addition, peasants are the leading part in building up the new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 农民大学生更是新农村建设的领头雁。

sentences.english: Stalks of grain, representing the peasant population, surround the gate.
sentences.chinese: 围绕着天安门的稻穗代表了中国的农民阶级。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers had quit farming and were cutting railroad ties so they could feed their families.
sentences.chinese: 有些农民放弃了耕作，靠砍伐铺铁路的枕木养家糊口。

sentences.english: The farmers are queuing in the Postal Savings Bank of China.
sentences.chinese: 农民们正在中国邮政储蓄银行排队。

sentences.english: If farmers keep taking the land giants pandas will have nowhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 如果农民继续攫娶土地，大熊猫就没有地方可住了。

sentences.english: The peasants here were of a much poorer class than those in Kousminski.
sentences.chinese: 这里的农民比库兹明斯科耶的农民要穷得多。

sentences.english: The peasants here were of a much poorer class than those in Kousminski.
sentences.chinese: 这里的农民比库兹明斯科耶的农民要穷得多。

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表产业工人和农民的锤子镰刀图案用作前苏联国徽。

sentences.english: The peasant led us down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民带我们朝山下走。

sentences.english: Even bides such as a quarrel between husband and wife are brought to the peasant association.
sentences.chinese: 连两公婆吵架的小事，也要到农民协会去解决。

sentences.english: Farmer film, who holding the post of to look to feel is sportive.
sentences.chinese: 农民拍电影，任谁看了都觉得是闹着玩的。

sentences.english: At this time of the year farmers to capalternating currentity to plow their fields.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时辰，农民们滥觞犁地。

sentences.english: The farmers tamped down the earth around the base of the seedings .
sentences.chinese: 农民们把幼苗基部四周的泥土压实。

sentences.english: Farmers, encouraged by high prices, have been planting more grain.
sentences.chinese: 农民受高物价鼓励，已经种植了更多的作物。

sentences.english: This world of difference continues almost a year in Shenyang labour market of migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 沈阳农民工市场的冰火两重天已持续了快一年的时间。
